title: How will Industry Revolution 4.0 change the automotive business? - Quora

response.answer_text: In my opinion not only automative but entire manufacturing industries or rather society will be impacted by Industry 4.0 aka I40. Let's first understand what exactly I40 is: In I40, every product, device, machine and process will be interconnected each other, composing Cyber-Physical Systems able to communicate with each other, resulting in a very high degree of automation. Since interconnection and communication are paramount, hence Internet of things (IoT) will play a crucial role and will be implicit in I40. Hence people use Industrial IoT and I40 interchanbly. How it will impact: Enhanced productivity through optimization and automation.Real-time data for a real-time supply chain in a real-time economy.Higher business continuity through advanced maintenance and monitoring possibilities.Better quality products: real-time monitoring, IoT-enabled quality improvement.Better working conditions and sustainability.And many more. For more details please refer: Industry 4.0: fourth industrial revolution guide to Industrie 4.0
